product_meta.description: The HTC EVO Shift 4G Android smartphone is a relatively small WiMAX device sporting a slide-out QWERTY keyboard, HTC's Sense user interface, mobile WiFi hotspot, and 5 megapixel camera with HD video recording. This smartphone also features a multi-format music player, Bluetooth compatibility, microSD slot for additional storage, 3.6-inch capacitive touch display, email client, and full web-browser. The EVO Shift 4G also offers access to thousands of apps, games, eBooks, movies, and music available on Google's Play Store.
